abstract: 'Really inspired by this regiment of remarkable men'.
description: So keen was Hugh Melville to join his older brother in the second world war, that he deliberately failed first year Medicine to achieve his goal. While Hugh travelled extensively and fought in different countries, it was the men he fought with that were an inspiration to him, back then and for the rest of his life.
